item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

20. After 30 years, FDA overhauls guideline for the claim "Healthy" on food packages (11 points | 4 comments)

22. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (96 points | 24 comments)
23. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (36 points | 23 comments)
24. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (62 points | 25 comments)
25. The Zombocom Problem (218 points | 62 comments)
26. Ask HN: What's Your Morning Routine? (16 points | 15 comments)
27. Apple and Meta go to war over interoperability vs. privacy (86 points | 90 comments)

29. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (239 points | 27 comments)
